Package picross

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
picross.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
GameModel class purpose is to hold data about this program, and to instruct the GameView class when changes have been made.
Author:
Spencer

  • Field Details

    • dimension

      protected int dimension
      Int to contain current dimension and size of board. Default 5x5.

    • boardData

      protected boolean[][] boardData
      A double array of booleans acting as a "virtualized" version of the game board. Containing what parts need to be selected, and what parts dont.

      public void setDimension​(int dimension)

      Parameters:

    • genGame

      public boolean[][] genGame​(boolean[][] board)
      Worker method to randomly generate a game.
      Parameters:
      board - Method takes in a double array of booleans, and randomly sets each member to true or false.
      Returns:
      Returns the double boolean.

    • configureGame

      public void configureGame()
      Method to set up the game board.

    • move

      public String move​(int x, int y, boolean mrkMode)
      Move method. takes in an x and y and sets parts of the virtual board to true or false. Adding or taking away points as required. Currently incomplete.
      Parameters:
      x - Takes in the x coordinate of the virtual button.
      y - Takes in the y coordinate of the virtual button.
      mrkMode - takes in whether mrkMode is on.
      Returns:
      Returns the new point total.

    • toggle

      static Boolean toggle​(boolean b)
      Method to flip a boolean from true to false or vice versa.
      Parameters:
      b - Method takes in a boolean.
      Returns:
      Method returns a flipped boolean.
